guis

Class EditorCanvasDraw

  • java.lang.Object
    • guis.Draw
      • guis.EditorCanvasDraw
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener, Updatable

    public class EditorCanvasDraw
extends Draw
    This canvas makes up the editable map portion of the editor frame. The changes made by the player will show on this canvas by drawing on it or modifying its size.

      • makeDraw

        protected void makeDraw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Refreshes the canvas' game map with updated elements. Just draws the whole array out according to the tiles' colour.
        Specified by:
        makeDraw in class Draw
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics class this method draws onto.

      • drawActors

      • drawTiles
